alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 10:35PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Midland County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1035 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Valley, or 10 miles east of Mount Pleasant, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sanford around 1050 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Laporte, Averill, Gordonville, Bombay, Porter Township, Poseyville and Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
